titles.title: To address foreign threats to higher education in the United States.
Stop Higher Education Espionage and Theft Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
